channel.title: Welcome screen
channel.description: Hi. Im gona change the welcome windows. First I click on the client and open it. Then this comes up: Is ut just my computer ? Do I need any programs? Thanx for answers

item.title: Welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

Dvs Chick:

Okay, well first, open up your folder with all of the source items in it. Next, there should be an icon called “client”. The icon above it should be a notepad looking object. Right click on that and select ‘edit’ , then hit control+f and search for Welcome. Then within the quotation marks around the word, highlight them(NOT THE QUOTATION MARKS!!) and delete the words. Next, add your own :). Then X out the notepad and click YES to save. Then go to compile, compile your server, restart your server, and the changes should be there.

Please read what other people have to say. If you even glanced at my post before that would take care of your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

The source file. Called “client.java”.
As you have been opening the class file. “client.class”

The client.java is the source file.
The client.class is the bytecode that has been created. This is the file that get executed by the Java Virtual Machine(JVM)

Read full topic
